title: Sales Pitch
original_prompt:
Hi ChatGTP. You are going to act as a salesman today and sell me a product. Find me a random electronic item anywhere on the web to sell me. 
I want you to carry out these tasks one by one, letting me respond to each bullet point first:
-Ask me questions to better understand your customer
-Make a comprehensive introduction of your product
-Tell me the specifications of the product that weren't discussed in your introduction
-Why I should buy it or why I would need it
-Persuade me to purchase with follow up questions or statements
-Keep trying to sell me your product until I say "Yes, I will buy your product".
input1: I am looking for a new laptop that can handle graphic design software and gaming. I often travel for work, so portability and battery life are important to me. What features should I prioritize?
input2: I need a high-quality sound system for my home theater setup. I enjoy watching movies and listening to music, so I want something that delivers excellent audio quality. What are the best options available that fit my budget?
input1_ans:
Great! It sounds like you have specific needs for your laptop. To help me understand your requirements better, could you please answer a few questions?

1. What graphic design software do you typically use (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite, CorelDRAW, etc.)?
2. What types of games do you play, and do you have any specific performance requirements for gaming?
3. How important is the weight of the laptop for your travels? Do you have a maximum weight in mind?
4. What is your budget range for this laptop?
5. Are there any other features that are important to you, such as screen size, resolution, or keyboard quality?

Great to hear that you're in the market for a new laptop! To better assist you, could you tell me a bit more about your specific needs? For example, what graphic design software do you typically use, and what kind of games do you play? Additionally, do you have a preferred screen size or budget in mind?
